resources.string: Need to restart the application to take effect

Wait for timeout, please make sure your Root Manager is running in the background and try again! 

Please make sure you have not prevented "Authorization Manager (SuperSu, Magisk Manager, etc.)" from starting itself and allowing background pop-ups, hover windows, and other permissions. If the authorization dialog box never pops up, we suggest restarting the phone and trying again!

Without ROOT permission, you will lose many features. \nIf you miss the authorization prompt or don\'t see the pop-up window, please find your ROOT manager and manually set to allow Scene to use ROOT permission~
Your phone doesn\'t seem to have busybox installed, which will make Scene unusable, should I install it immediately (need to modify System)?
You should try Scene too, I think it\'s not bad, download address: \n http://vtools.omarea.com/
Backup the currently used Boot as img, copy it to /sdcard/boot.img
Backup the currently used exported Recovery as img, copy it to /sdcard/recovery.img
Export DTBO partition to img image, copy it to /sdcard/dtbo.img
Export Persist partition to img image, copy it to /sdcard/persist.img
/sdcard/%s.img already exists, do you want to overwrite the existing file? \n
Insufficient storage space, please set aside at least 200M free space!
Charging state, the rest screen action is delayed until charging is completed
Switch SELinux to tolerant mode (some software called [turn off Selinux]), SeLinux state has no effect on Scene, and turn on tolerant mode may crash and reboot!
Show the log of Scene\'s foreground application process (need to restart accessibility services)
Show function description hint (question mark) icon next to function item
Automatically end the process when an exception occurs during operation to avoid white screen jamming
When Scene flickers with errors, click the button below to grab the log via logcat and send it to the developer to solve the problem.
Show Scene\'s resident notifications as black background when the system is in night mode (no need to turn on this option under normal conditions)
View the power consumption (current) data recorded during application use
Click here to activate accessibility services

Scene enhanced service
You need to activate this service to use the following functions:

1. Dynamic response (automatically adjust performance according to the foreground application).

2. Automatic behavior (in the switch Recycle the process when switching networks or switching applications when the screen is displayed).

3. Automatic installation (automatically click next when installing third-party applications)
Please activate the [Scene Accessibility Service] option in the system settings
Accessibility services are not activated, click here to activate
According to the application to adjust performance, automatically switch GPS, record power consumption speed, all need to activate this service
If you want to use the "charge speed" and "charge protection" functions, please make sure to keep Scene running in the background!

The phone will decide whether to activate USB-PD charging or not based on compatibility, no manual setting is needed. Manual switching will result in slow charging speed, so no manual changes are allowed!
Not in PD fast charging mode
OK, if you want the phone to reboot and turn on this function automatically, please allow Scene to boot up!
Charging acceleration service is disabled, you may need to reboot your phone to restore the default setting!
$ slow charge when close to full \n\n and actively reduce charge speed at night
Stop charging after reaching the specified power \n\nNote: Long-term use may lead to power display inaccuracy
Stop charging when %d%% is reached, resume below %d%%

Adjust the charge speed limit. Crazy to adjust high meaningless, because it will not achieve the actual effect, please adjust the value within the effective range \n\n Note: the upper value is for reference only, please take the actual charging speed shall prevail!
The system adjusts the upper limit of the charging speed in stages according to the power level, which helps protect the battery life \n\n generally recommended to keep the default setting

Scene will perform speed change at different times according to your choice, the differences are as follows 

Lower speed: only reset the charging speed when the charger is connected and the charge percentage changes 
Accelerate charging: reset the charging speed when the battery status changes and the charger is connected 
Charge to death: automatically reset the charging speed every second based on the logic of [Charge to accelerate] Speed
Charging should be displayed as a positive number, discharging should be displayed as a negative number
Scene provided presets, each mode is distinct
The preset provided by Scene, pay more attention to performance release as a whole
According to changes in the foreground application, automatic switching mode
Lift the game frequency limit/frame lock and high temperature reminder, please pay attention to protect your equipment!

Applications that have not separately set the scheduling mode will use this mode by default. \n\nIf you need to individually set the mode for an application, please click [App Policy] at the bottom of the current interface
After the mobile phone enters the standby state, it will switch to the selected mode
After the foreground application changes, delay 5s before performing the scheduling mode switch

If this option is not turned on, Scene will only execute the scheduling profile when it needs to change gears, for example: switching between multiple applications set to [power saving mode], the scheduling profile only Will be executed once. 

In strict mode, Scene will execute the scheduling configuration file every time the foreground application changes, and notify the application (package name) that is switched to the foreground to run. Scheduling configuration authors can use this feature to individually design scheduling parameters for different applications, and are no longer limited to the limitation of only four gears. 

When the Snapdragon 855, 865, and 888 models use the [Classic Configuration] [Performance Focus] configuration source, you can turn on the strict mode and experience the exclusive optimization in the following applications:
Yuanshen (official server, B server, Xiaomi server)
Xianyu, Taobao, Jingdong, Tmall, Baidu Post Bar
Twin Vision
Bilibili, Douyin

Other processor models, unless you are using an external configuration source (and the configuration author It has been indicated that this feature is supported), otherwise there is no need to turn on this option!
Set up a separate scheduling strategy for each application
Before installing a valid scheduling configuration, you cannot turn on this feature~

You have already installed the scheduling configuration provided by another author (located in /data/powercfg.sh), and to change the configuration source you need to remove it first. Do you want to delete it now? \n\n* It is recommended to reboot the phone once after removing it
You are using the scheduling configuration provided by other authors~
Scene\'s own scheduling configuration has not been adapted to the current SOC~
You have not turned on [Dynamic Response], Scene cannot adjust the performance of the device according to changes in the foreground application!

Uperf scheduling only provides three modes of [stuck/balanced/charged electricity], which correspond to Scene\’s [power saving/balanced/performance] respectively. \nWhen you select [Extreme Speed] mode in Scene, the actual effect is [Charge], which is the same as selecting [Performance] mode
Model information Please do not enter special symbols! \n has been compatible with the model code of the [Application Variables] module, copy it and reopen this window to use it!

After modification, you can click "Restore"->"Confirm" to restore the model before modification, uninstalling Scene will cause the backup model information to be lost, please be sure to restore before uninstalling! 

Or, you can also restore the model information by re-flashing the full ROM! 

Use DualBootPatcher multi-system software do not use this function to modify models!!!
This feature is not supported on your device yet!

Disable the real-time blurring effect of Flyme6 drop-down notification center to reduce the lag of drop-down notification center on Meizu low-end machines during games or video playback, and maybe save power, which requires reboot.
MIUI9 go to the notification center search
Hide the search box in the pull-down notification center of MIUI9 system by default, takes effect after reboot
Customize phone DPI or resolution, it may cause the device can not start normally, or UI error
Disguise model by changing build.prop, some phones may not boot or have bugs
Customize phone WIFI network card MAC address, only support some devices
Customize cell phone WIFI network card MAC address, only support some devices, more suitable for Android Q
dex2oat compile the application to reduce the CPU and RAM usage at runtime. Compilation process may take half an hour, and need to recompile after system update!

After Android N, in order to reduce the application space and improve the installation efficiency, the dex is no longer compiled completely when the application is installed, which causes the running speed to decrease. By checking "Compile" in this function, the app will be compiled in speed mode when installing, the installation speed will be significantly slower, but it will run more smoothly (about 20% improvement, no improvement to game frame rate!). . 

Take the Oreo system Douyu TV client as an example, the base.odex is only 6.8MB when freshly installed, but it increases to 103MB after compilation. 

But many domestic applications use hot update technology, and they often need to download the latest code from the server and parse the rendering when running, which is the main reason why these applications start slowly or lag after starting. So dex2oat compilation does not bring significant performance improvements for such applications!
For Android N+, adjust the dex2oat compilation policy for PackageManager app installation, you need to reset it after updating the system
Parse the wpa_supplicant.conf or WifiConfigStore.xml in the /data/misc/wifi directory

Turn off some options in Performance Boost Config to avoid power consumption caused by the CPU being pulled up frequently, but keep the application startup boost, which will slightly reduce the experience. A reboot is required!
All loopback devices have been occupied and cannot be mounted!
SWAP is being closed, which can be slow
Description: \n higher value will be more aggressive use of SWAP, this setting has a hard to perceive impact on smoothness, adjust as appropriate~
Description: ZRAM is an implementation of SWAP. When available memory becomes insufficient, some of the data in memory is compressed. However, the CPU will become busy as a result~
ZRAM is in use and the compression algorithm cannot be changed right now. \n\nTo make the settings take effect, click the "Adjust" button below
use up ZRAM and then use
and ZRAM used at the same time

If you can use SWAP normally without opening this item, there is no need to open it. 

Unless SWAP cannot be started, or the phone freezes after starting SWAP, you only need to enable this option! 

For example: Xiaomi SDM845 model is on Android9.0, you need to check this option to use SWAP normally

Description: Swapfile is similar to the virtual memory of Windows, and the exchange efficiency is limited by the disk performance. Do not use this function on a mobile phone with a small capacity or insufficient space to prevent the flash memory from aging too quickly!
boot from the start (to allow Scene to start automatically)
Note: You need to allow Scene to start automatically, it will take effect next time you boot!
You have installed the Magisk framework. It is recommended to use the latest version of the add-on module to enhance the reliability of SWAP control. The main functions of the add-on are as follows:
1. Improve the speed of restoring ZRAM and Swapfile settings after the phone restarts
2. Adjust the LMK parameters according to the device RAM capacity to strengthen the background retention capacity
3. Adjust VM parameters to improve the enthusiasm of ZRAM and Swapfile use
After downloading the module, please brush in Magisk Manager by yourself, and restart the phone!
ZRAM compression rate is usually between 20~45%

Data compression algorithm: %s
Original data size: %s
Compressed size: %s
Physical memory usage: %s
Maximum memory usage: %s
Memory Occupation limit: %s
Compression rate: %s

Data compression algorithm: %s
original data size: %s
compressed size: %s
compression rate :%s

ZRAM Writeback
Writeback block: %s
Written back: %dMB
Total read: %dMB
Total writeback:%dMB

This value specifies how much physical memory the Linux kernel will reserve. When the memory is insufficient, it will immediately begin to compress the memory to SWAP/ZRAM, and the device will obviously become slower before the available memory rises to a reasonable range.\n\nSimply put the extra_free_kbytes setting more Larger, the more aggressive the memory recovery (swap or kill process), but it is not recommended to set too large, so as not to waste physical memory and increase the burden on the disk/processor!

The value range is 0~1000, where 1000 means 10%, which means that the difference between the three values of the memory water level line low/min/high (physical RAM capacity) is 10%. 

For example (my phone):
pageSize=4KB
managed=1951743(pages)
min_free_kbytes=10900(KB)
watermark_scale_factor=500

The min value is
10900(KB)/4( PageSize)=2725(pages)
low value is approximately
1951743*5%+2725≈100312(pages)
high value is approximately
1951743*10%+2725≈197899(pages)
Note: the final low, high The value may be too large due to extra_free_kbytes.

In this example,
min=2725=10MB
low=100312≈392MB
high=197899≈773MB

means that the memory will start to be recycled if the memory is lower than 392M RAM, until the available RAM is higher than 773MB~
The battery is low, please charge it!
None of the apps are selected!
The elderly call an expert directly
Slow down, the world is pleasing to the eye
Play the game to suppress the shock
No available schema configuration script found

The app does not come with a performance configuration script for your phone. You can choose "Get scripts online" to see if there is one available for your phone, or "Learn more" for a custom configuration tutorial!
First time user, select configuration preferences first
Some phones have a dynamic adjustment mechanism for CPU parameters, which can cause custom parameters to fail quickly, and temperature control can also limit you from cranking up the CPU frequency.
Please long press to select directory
Please download and install "Scene-Advanced Settings" from the Scene official website, and set it to allow the background to start automatically!
from the "Scene-Advanced Settings" component synchronization Xposed settings failed!
When installing third-party applications, automatically help you point "Next" and "Install"

Automatically click the "Skip" button, which can help you automatically skip some open-screen advertisements, but it will reduce system performance and cause delays\n* It is better to use only in simplified Chinese Effect
Use some button data recorded in the cloud to click the special skip button
Ad traffic is an important source of income for some software developers/businesses. If your time is not very urgent, it is recommended that you browse and click on the ad content you like^_^
Please authorize the Scene "modify system settings" first!
Please authorize and allow Scene "notification permission" first!

Scene is an application geared towards playing with computers. Using it requires excellent eyesight, reading comprehension and a good mind. 

Unexpected errors may occur during use, resulting in data loss or even failure to turn on the computer properly. 
Please be sure not to use it on your [for work] or on a phone that has [important data] to avoid damage! 

According to past feedback from users, using this software on the following manufacturers models is likely to lose data or even fail to boot up: 
Meizu, LG, Google Pixel 


The process of using it, be sure to read the prompt information carefully and operate carefully, do not easily dial the function options that you do not understand! 

In addition, the author of this application does not guarantee that it will provide help for use and advice on recovery from failure!
Please authorize Display Over Other Apps permission for Scene first!

Allow Scene to automatically adjust LMK parameters according to your RAM capacity, thus enhancing background capabilities (may cause lagging at low RAM). To restore, please turn off this option and reboot your phone. If you want to set it automatically after booting, please allow the toolbox to start automatically
Scene integrated Busybox does not support your current system, please download and install Busybox yourself.
You cannot use this function without obtaining ROOT permission
The following applications that have been added to freeze mode have lost their startup shortcuts or were not created successfully, are they recreated immediately?
Adding shortcuts in bulk may fail, you can long press the application icon to send a single shortcut to the desktop!
√ Icon display status has been switched
You may need to delete the added shortcuts manually!
Need "Read/Write Local Storage" permission to use system wallpaper as software background
Shortcut creation request has been sent
Do you want to add "%s" to your desktop for quick access?
This feature does not support adding shortcuts
Need read/write access to external storage
Specified configuration file does not exist or has no read permissions

Most of Scene\'s modifications to the system can now be done in the form of the Magisk module. But first you have to agree to Scene to install the add-on module on your phone automatically and restart it (recommended)!
Profile not detected, dynamic response has been automatically disabled!
At least one core should be turned on
Start to reclaim a small amount of memory (long press to reclaim more~)
Not sure, your kernel does not support it!
Idle SWAP is not enough to complete automatic recycling~
Do not perform multiple memory reclamation operations at the same time~
The operation failed, and there was an error in calculating the capacity!
Sufficient memory, no need to clean up!
Enough memory has been released via ZRAM write-back

Click the menu in the upper right corner, select and edit the temperature control file, click Save after editing ~

Note: With the Android system constantly updated, to modify the system partition becomes more and more difficult, may be modified can not be successfully saved, or reboot that is automatically restored, it is recommended to use magisk module to complete the temperature control modification! 

 temperature control file is usually in the /system/etc or /vendor/etc directory, the name begins with "thermal", suffix ".conf"
Process Manager is not compatible with your phone yet!
